meanings: fight, (공공장소에서 시끄럽게 하는) brawl, (말다툼) quarrel, argument, fight, (공공장소에서 시끄럽게) brawl, (말다툼하다) quarrel, argue, have an argument
People tend to become attached to each other after a fight
A fight should be stopped and bargaining should be encouraged
(사람이 하는) a one-legged fight, (싸움닭이 하는) cockfight
